description: Try our easy to follow Kale & Apple Salad With Tahini & Maple Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Dec 2019,Summer,Father's Day,High fibre,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Kale,Vegan
name: Kale & Apple Salad With Tahini & Maple Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1 tbs apple cider vinegar with 2 tsp oil in a large bowl. Add both kale leaves and massage for 1-2 minutes or until softened and bright in colour.
To make the dressing, whisk remaining vinegar and oil, syrup and tahini together in a small bowl.
Arrange kale on a platter. Add apple and walnuts and season with pepper. Serve with dressing.
